Jirōbō while using his superhuman strength in his Cursed Seal Level 2 form, lifts up a gigantic lump of the ground and throws it forward at the opponent where he strikes the earth structure with a powerful punch, shattering it and causing the fragments to bombard the opponent.

[[es:Elemento Tierra: Erupción Rocosa de la Montaña Cañon]]
